attributes.action: Petition to prevent Piers Morgan returning to the UK if he is deported from the US.
attributes.additional_details:
We, the undersigned, wish, in the very unlikely but none the less very foreboding event of Piers Morgan being deported from the US, that he should not be allowed to return to the UK.
We realise that this may break numerous international laws and might cause some issues with human rights organizations but we think that, in this case, an exception must be made.
